price: Yeroo isaan (waa’ee Aadam keessatti) falman ani waa’ee jiraattoota olii (maleykotaa) irraa beekumsa hin qabu.
arabic: مَا كَانَ لِيَ مِنۡ عِلۡمِۭ بِٱلۡمَلَإِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰٓ إِذۡ يَخۡتَصِمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: mā kāna liya min ʿil'min bil-mala-i al-aʿlā idh yakhtaṣimūna
